participant_1.background:
I like people who are understanding of my diet and phobia.
I keep fit by weeding and doing yard work in my garden.
I enjoy wearing comfortable, loose clothing that allows me to move around easily in my wheelchair.
I enjoy listening to Katy Perry while I cook and lift weights.
i am from georgia.

participant_2.background:
I am of average weight.
I don't really care for social media, I'm more interested in getting to know the people in my new city.
I find that getting lost in a good book takes me back to my childhood.
I love all animals, but I have a special place in my heart for dogs.
i have a george foreman grill at home.

content.text: Hey, I'm from Georgia. How do you like where you live?
I am new to my city but I love it so far! I love getting lost in a good book. What do you like to do for fun?
I enjoy gardening and yard work. I keep fit by weeding and pulling weeds. I also like to cook and lift weights.
That's cool! I don't really care for social media. I'd rather meet new people and get to know them in person. I love dogs and have a George Foreman grill at home.
I like dogs too! I have a shiba inu named Tobi.
Shiba inus are so cute! I have a golden retriever named Bailey.
I love golden retrievers! They're so sweet and friendly.
What do you like to do for fun?
I love reading, going for walks in the park, and spending time with my friends and family.
That sounds like a great way to spend your free time. I like to do a lot of the same things.
I'm glad we have similar interests!
I think we could be good friends.
